short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple connection to the Onside team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a button to an athlete's NCSA profile. Clicking the button generates an email to send to the Onside team to add that recruit to your Onside database.
